name: Watch the Food Grow
description:
Watch the Food Grow, is a game where you... well, watch your food grow. It's a farming simulator that takes place in real-time, so planting a crop and harvesting can take a few months. You can choose to leave the game open, or come back to it later on in the year to see how far your crops have grown.

This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.
